item.title: Yvan Gauthier
item.description: I am senior data scientist with the National Research Council Digital Technologies Centre, where I lead NRC’s Artificial Intelligence Accelerator. As part of the NRC’s Data Analytics Centre, I deliver digital products and services aiming to accelerate the adoption of AI in the Government of Canada. Before, I worked with the Department of National Defence (DND), where I became the first-ever Director of Data Science and established a data science team supporting the Chief Data Officer and the Assistant Deputy Minister (Data, Innovation, Analytics).
